Table of Contents

Class Article

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Models
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Represents a single entry (article/item) from an RSS, Atom or JSON Feed source. Stores metadata, content, user interaction state and processing flags. Designed for efficient querying and low memory usage on low-end hardware.

[Table("Articles")]
public class Article : INotifyPropertyChanged
Inheritance
object

Implements

ContentHash

SHA-256 hash of normalized title + cleaned content. Used to detect meaningful content changes between fetches.

[MaxLength(64)]
public string? ContentHash { get; set; }

Property Value

string

DisplayExcerpt

Clean, truncated preview text (max 200 characters) suitable for list and card views. Prioritizes Summary → cleaned Content → fallback message.

[NotMapped]
public string DisplayExcerpt { get; }
